text: Tharowa niyo: A Piyaratiyaya mi so Allah, go so (Qur-an a) Initoron rukami, go so Initoron ko Ibrahim, go so Ismail, go so Ishaq, go so Yaqoub, go so manga Moriyatao Niyan, go so inibugai ko Musa go so Äªsa, go so inibugai ko manga Nabi a pho-on ko Kadnan niran: Da-a shalbo-on nami Kiran a isa bo: Go sukami na Ron Kami Mbabayorantang
